table.name: quest_test
table.comment: Test results linked to a civicrm_contact record (expected usage is for student applicants).

field.name: test_id
field.comment: Test being reported (e.g. SAT, PSAT, etc). FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: score_composite
field.comment: Composite or total score for this test.

field.name: score_english
field.comment: English score if applicable for this test.

field.name: score_reading
field.comment: Reading score if applicable for this test.

field.name: score_writing
field.comment: Writing score if applicable for this test.

field.name: score_math
field.comment: Math score if applicable for this test.

field.name: score_science
field.comment: Science score if applicable for this test.

field.name: subject
field.comment: Test subject (for subject-specific tests e.g. AP and SAT II).

field.name: test_date
field.comment: Date that the test was taken (month and year are significant).
